category-def.name: MyBatisLink
category-def.label: MyBatisLink
category-def.description: IBatis/MyBatis Eclipse plugins help coders to navigate from java codes to the IBatis/MyBatis configuration xml files. The sqlmap elements of IBatis/MyBatis can be shown when coders press Ctrl and click the sqlmap element id in Java code. The plugin also provide a dialog to find the IBatis/MyBatis sqlmap elements.
